channel.title: For all Dodian haters[should be everyone]
channel.description:
I have worked with my Cote d'or source(project destiny or whatever) for a long time. I then found a devolution server source. I ran it, and found out I can hold 4x the amount of players. People were ranting devolution didn't have spec and wanted to quit my server :mad: .. A lot of people on server/forums say dodian can't be turned good and say its the worse server.
Heres something that is common in my server: New player: logged in New player: is this dodian? Me: yes New player: ok im out of here
...
But there is a lot of good comments as well New player: logged in New player: plays for a while New player: what source is this?http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=post;board=48.0 Start new topic Me: dodian New player: what?! impossible dodian doesn't have all this!
What my dodian has: Splashing with mage bonus [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/2208/dodian1my3.png[/img][/URL] Special attacks [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/5941/dodian3lp8.png[/img][/URL] Also working Granite Maul spec(quick smash) [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img165.imageshack.us/img165/3637/dodian2ci4.png[/img][/URL] Fully working prayer with switching [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img340.imageshack.us/img340/9887/dodian4cm3.png[/img][/URL] Pest control [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img505.imageshack.us/img505/3117/dodian5iy1.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img340.imageshack.us/img340/6285/dodian6om6.png[/img][/URL] Fully working non multi-zone Clan chat [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/4227/dodian7lp0.png[/img][/URL] Collage that shows jad minigame/special attacks/projectiles [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img172.imageshack.us/img172/4617/dodian8yn7.jpg[/img][/URL] Now stop saying dodian stinks now because its really annoying............ :mad: I guess this thread is too show whats possible with dodian And this shouldn't really be advertising because I took off my signature for my IP until this thread dies out or something

Deltascape look’s very nice btw
